## Description {#details}

Configuration for the mach-o header of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a>.

Specify common load commands that should be added to the header.

Definition at line 52 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/machoplatform-h">MachOPlatform.h</a>.
